content:
Convert the following page segment ({image_url}), using the context of the full page it came from ({page_image_url}) if necessary, to markdown. Use simple and minimal markdown without any styling.

- Convert tables into proper markdown tables
- Describe any images, charts, diagrams, or visuals in text
- Convert formulas to markdown format
- Preserve all content from the original page
- Maintain the original structure and organization

Return ONLY the markdown enclosed in ```markdown``` tags.
